A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A total disappointment! Rian Johnson should have been fired...there were tons of schizophrenic plot lines but no arc to the story. The Last Jedi left me angry. 45 minutes of my life was wasted with a Casino scene that made absolutely no sense. This episode was supposed to be about Skywalker\, but it was so badly written and badly directed...it turns out to be about nothing. Oh\, and then whoops Skywalker is dead. For fans of this franchise it is an insult. This movie should NEVER have made it to the cinema\, a poorly conceived\, horribly crafted pile of poo.
